catalog_info.title: What is Life?
catalog_info.prereq: Course open to Freshman Students Only
catalog_info.description: This seminar considers the conditions of a cell necessary to support life. The proposal is to find a definition for a living system using information and principles of biology, chemistry and physics to characterize some central properties of living cells, like energy and material uptake and use, cellular crowding, diffusion and molecular interactions, homeostasis and growth.
